Kamala Harris campaign reserves $370 million in ads after labour day, targets battleground states
content: Vice President Kamala Harris' campaign had reserved $370 million for advertising from Labor Day to Election Day in crucial battleground states. The campaign planned to spend $170 million on television ads and over $200 million on digital platforms. In contrast, Donald Trump's campaign reserved ads in only Pennsylvania and Georgia.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris' campaign had reserved $370 million for advertising from Labor Day to Election Day in crucial battleground states. The campaign planned to spend $170 million on television ads and over $200 million on digital platforms. In contrast, Donald Trump's campaign reserved ads in only Pennsylvania and Georgia.

title: Once a democrat voting for Hillary, now ... ': What J D Vance said about wife Usha
content: Usha Vance, wife of Ohio Senator JD Vance, shifted from supporting Hillary Clinton to embracing the MAGA agenda. Her transformation has drawn interest due to her Democratic roots and elite educational background. Usha's support and contributions have been significant in JD's political journey, highlighting her behind-the-scenes influence.
summary: Usha Vance, wife of Ohio Senator JD Vance, shifted from supporting Hillary Clinton to embracing the MAGA agenda. Her transformation has drawn interest due to her Democratic roots and elite educational background. Usha's support and contributions have been significant in JD's political journey, highlighting her behind-the-scenes influence.

title: 'He definitely was a hero': Wife of Donald Trump rally hero Corey Comperatore speaks out for the first time
content: During a rally for Donald Trump in Butler Township, Corey Comperatore died while protecting his family from gunfire. His widow and daughters recounted his courageous act, describing him as a hero. The family received vast support and plans to start a foundation in his name. Legal action is being pursued for security lapses at the event.
summary: During a rally for Donald Trump in Butler Township, Corey Comperatore died while protecting his family from gunfire. His widow and daughters recounted his courageous act, describing him as a hero. The family received vast support and plans to start a foundation in his name. Legal action is being pursued for security lapses at the event.

title: Watch: Trump video criticises Kamala Harris as 'weak,' 'failed,' 'dangerously liberal'
content: Former President Donald Trump released a video on X (formerly Twitter) targeting Kamala Harris. The video contained clips of Harris discussing policy positions, including eliminating filibusters, banning fracking, supporting gun confiscation, and advocating for socialist health care. The video aimed to portray her as weak, failed, and dangerously liberal, raising concerns over her potential presidency.
summary: Former President Donald Trump released a video on X (formerly Twitter) targeting Kamala Harris. The video contained clips of Harris discussing policy positions, including eliminating filibusters, banning fracking, supporting gun confiscation, and advocating for socialist health care. The video aimed to portray her as weak, failed, and dangerously liberal, raising concerns over her potential presidency.

title: Pakistan formulates strategy to tackle mpox, allays fears of outbreak
content: The Pakistan government formulated a policy to address the mpox virus after only one case was reported. Surveillance and screening procedures were instated at entry points, with laboratories allocated for diagnosis. Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif ordered strict vigilance and an awareness campaign. Public isolation and prompt doctor consultation were advised for symptomatic individuals.
summary: The Pakistan government formulated a policy to address the mpox virus after only one case was reported. Surveillance and screening procedures were instated at entry points, with laboratories allocated for diagnosis. Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif ordered strict vigilance and an awareness campaign. Public isolation and prompt doctor consultation were advised for symptomatic individuals.

title: Kamala Harris’s 'day one' price control plan draws conservative skepticism: 'You've spent three-and-a-half years raising prices'
content: Vice President Kamala Harris faced criticism for her pledge to tackle rising prices on the first day of her potential presidency. Critics highlighted her nearly four-year tenure in the current administration, questioning why these issues have not been addressed earlier.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris faced criticism for her pledge to tackle rising prices on the first day of her potential presidency. Critics highlighted her nearly four-year tenure in the current administration, questioning why these issues have not been addressed earlier.

title: Bangladesh’s ousted PM Sheikh Hasina faces seventh murder case charges
Donald Trump set to rally Pennsylvania voters near Biden’s hometown, counter Harris' surge
content: Donald Trump rallied voters in northeastern Pennsylvania, seeking support from conservative, white working-class voters. Trump highlighted perceived Democratic vulnerabilities following Biden's exit, paving the way for Kamala Harris's presidential run. Harris plans a bus tour, while Trump aims to capitalize on his past electoral success in Luzerne County.
summary: Donald Trump rallied voters in northeastern Pennsylvania, seeking support from conservative, white working-class voters. Trump highlighted perceived Democratic vulnerabilities following Biden's exit, paving the way for Kamala Harris's presidential run. Harris plans a bus tour, while Trump aims to capitalize on his past electoral success in Luzerne County.

title: Former Rep. George Santos expected to plead guilty to multiple fraud charges
content: Former US Representative George Santos was expected to plead guilty to multiple fraud counts in his federal case. The plea was set for a Monday hearing on Long Island, following a joint request by both parties involved. Scheduled jury selection on September 9 might be impacted.
summary: Former US Representative George Santos was expected to plead guilty to multiple fraud counts in his federal case. The plea was set for a Monday hearing on Long Island, following a joint request by both parties involved. Scheduled jury selection on September 9 might be impacted.

title: 'Censorship dispute': Elon Musk's X to close operations in Brazil
content: Elon Musk's social media platform X ceased operations in Brazil due to censorship orders from Judge Alexandre de Moraes. X claimed Moraes threatened one of its legal representatives with arrest unless they complied. This follows earlier orders to block accounts linked to spreading fake news and hate messages during former President Jair Bolsonaro's term.
summary: Elon Musk's social media platform X ceased operations in Brazil due to censorship orders from Judge Alexandre de Moraes. X claimed Moraes threatened one of its legal representatives with arrest unless they complied. This follows earlier orders to block accounts linked to spreading fake news and hate messages during former President Jair Bolsonaro's term.

title: 'Worked at McDonald’s ... ': Kamala Harris shares early life struggles, posts pic with mom
content: Kamala Harris shared her childhood's economic struggles and the challenges faced by her family, who were renters for most of her early life. She recounted her mother saving for over a decade to buy a home. Harris also discussed working at McDonald's during college. She promised to prioritize reducing living costs and increasing economic security if elected president.
summary: Kamala Harris shared her childhood's economic struggles and the challenges faced by her family, who were renters for most of her early life. She recounted her mother saving for over a decade to buy a home. Harris also discussed working at McDonald's during college. She promised to prioritize reducing living costs and increasing economic security if elected president.

title: US presidential elections: 'Hope' and 'progress' in America as Donald Trump totters
content: Shepard Fairey, known for the Obama 'hope' poster, released a similar Kamala Harris 'progress' poster for the current election. His endorsement of Harris and her running mate Tim Walz contrasts his past disappointment with Obama and refusal to support Clinton or Biden. Fairey found inspiration in Harris's campaign message: 'We are not going back.'
summary: Shepard Fairey, known for the Obama 'hope' poster, released a similar Kamala Harris 'progress' poster for the current election. His endorsement of Harris and her running mate Tim Walz contrasts his past disappointment with Obama and refusal to support Clinton or Biden. Fairey found inspiration in Harris's campaign message: 'We are not going back.'

US presidential elections: Donald Trump drafts Tulsi Gabbard for debate preparation
content: Donald Trump enlisted former Democratic lawmaker Tulsi Gabbard to help him prepare for a debate against Kamala Harris. The move aimed to structure his campaign and regain support amid erratic behavior and declining poll numbers. Gabbard, aligned with Trump's views on national security, had clashed with Harris in a 2019 debate.
summary: Donald Trump enlisted former Democratic lawmaker Tulsi Gabbard to help him prepare for a debate against Kamala Harris. The move aimed to structure his campaign and regain support amid erratic behavior and declining poll numbers. Gabbard, aligned with Trump's views on national security, had clashed with Harris in a 2019 debate.

title: 'Imagine explaining his wife': Mike Francesa slams Mets for 'Hawk Tuah Girl' first pitch
content: Mike Francesa criticised the New York Mets' decision to invite Hailey Welch for the first pitch at their game against the Oakland A's. Welch, known for a viral controversial remark, was invited on a camp day with young fans attending. Francesa questioned the team's marketing decision and speculated on possible repercussions for those responsible.
summary: Mike Francesa criticised the New York Mets' decision to invite Hailey Welch for the first pitch at their game against the Oakland A's. Welch, known for a viral controversial remark, was invited on a camp day with young fans attending. Francesa questioned the team's marketing decision and speculated on possible repercussions for those responsible.

title: UFO sightings in Palmdale and Lancaster, California: Local residents share experiences on Ring Neighbors app
content: Residents of Palmdale and Lancaster, California, reported UFO sightings, sharing their experiences on the Ring Neighbors app. Local authorities have started investigating these intriguing claims. One resident described seeing a shooting star that zig-zagged in the sky. The sightings have sparked curiosity and discussions in the community. Authorities are looking into the validity of these reported sightings.
summary: Residents of Palmdale and Lancaster, California, reported UFO sightings, sharing their experiences on the Ring Neighbors app. Local authorities have started investigating these intriguing claims. One resident described seeing a shooting star that zig-zagged in the sky. The sightings have sparked curiosity and discussions in the community. Authorities are looking into the validity of these reported sightings.
